1337.description: This easteregg will make work a lot more fun... beware of eye cancer :)

configHeader.description: The master config file sets certain defaults which are important for SHPS as a server in general. There can be only one master config file.

workers.description: Spawns {%default} workers to handle work. Workers are working even closer together than clustered SHPSs. Makes use of multiple cores. Even with 0 workers there will always be a master process. Insert -1 for smart worker regulation

eastereggs.description: Enable eastereggs which might give information about the used SHPS version to a third party
